channel.title: 2017 12 15 on Zack's Notablog
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 12 15 on Zack's Notablog

item.title: Podcasts I heard
item.description: I’ve spent days sitting in a dark room looking into a microscope. Lots of the time I listen to music, but I’ve started to listen to podcasts. I’ve found a lot of great podcasts out there. I think my number one category of podcast is “the podcast about the small things.” Its always a welcome relief from the mainstream media which focuses more on the hyperbole of small things. I do like some news, but I’ve found some great podcasts that pitch the news in a more informal and friendly way.
